Package fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.continuous.discontinuities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DistanceFunction
    In order to identify discontinuities in continuous generalization, i.e.
    LegibilityFunction
    In order to identify discontinuities in continuous generalization, i.e.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoalescenceFunction
    This legibility functions checks that the continuous current state does not coalesce, and if it does, returns an amount of coalescence.
    ContinuousTransition
    Considering continuous or piecewise generalisation, a continuous transition represents one step in the discretization of the continuous/piecewise representations.
    DiscontinuitiesMeasure
    For a given list of continuous representations of a feature between scales, triggers the legibility functions for each representation and the distance function for each transition.
    FrechetDistanceFunction
    Distance Function dedicated to lines that uses the Frechet distance to measure the distance between the lines.
    HausdorffDistanceFunction
    Distance Function dedicated to lines that uses the Hausdorff distance to measure the distance between the lines.
    MeanLineDistanceFunction
    The mean distance is the area of the space between the two compared lines.
    NbOfBendsFunction
    This legibility functions counts the number of bends in the continuous current state for a given smoothing sigma.
    TopologyValidationFunction
    This legibility functions checks that the geometry is valid and value increases when more vertices are involved in topology problems.
